thread.title: Issue 1 would changes how legislative lines are drawn
thread.title_full: Issue 1 would changes how legislative lines are drawn - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Issue 1 would changes how legislative lines are drawn
text: Voters will have a chance to change the way politicians draw state legislative district lines when they consider State Issue 1 on November 3. " The drawing of the lines is the single most significant factor in determining who wins, " said former State Rep. Vernon Sykes, an Akron Democrat who with former state Rep. Matt Huffman, R-Lima, is co-chairing the Fair Districts for Ohio campaign promoting State Issue 1.
